title: Creating Hidden Endings - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai
tags: Caring Protagonist   Contracts   Cute Protagonist   Dungeons   Game Ranking System   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Kidnappings   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Possessive Characters   S*aves   Special Abilities   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World
author: Homekeeper B   홈키퍼B
description:
“Let’s sign an exclusive supporter contract.”

****

One month after possessing the game ‘Returning D-Class Hunter’, Seonwoo is kidnapped by the protagonist and receives an offer.

“Exclusive—Supporter? Do you want me to join your guild? Why?”

“Because I need you. Why? You don’t like my guild?”

Seonwoo, who is a C-class supporter, hopes not to get involved with Jehee, who is an S-class with a personality disorder but— Seonwoo receives a ring as a token of his contract.

“What is this? Servant Ring? ‘Be a servant loved by your master’?”

“If you’re comfortable with ‘Master’, you can call me that.”

Master? 

Seonwoo, who became a s*ave to Lee Jehee, wants to get out of it somehow, but—.

“You’re going to misunderstand that I’m interested in you? So what if I’m really interested in you?”>
